comments:
WTP 0.7 RC5
Geronimo 1.0 M3

1. start on clean workspace
2. create new dynamic web project w/ geronimo server
3. create a new jsp page
4. select jsp page in explorer and say debug as debug on server

looks like server startup works okay but then when it goes to publish, i end 
up with the Publishing to Apache Geronimo 1.0 dialog forever.

When i click on details, it says:
Launch client
Publishing to Apache Geronimo 1.0(Generic)... (Waiting)
Building workspace (Waiting)

Nothing in the log indicates anything went wrong, however, I noticed the 
following when i used -consolelog
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.DependantJob.shouldRun
(Dependant
Job.java:40)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.startJob
(JobManager.java:10
25)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.WorkerPool.startJob
(WorkerPool.java:19
9)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:69)

This appears to be a dup of 110903, an underlying job scheduling issue that
could appear with some servers. Since that bug has been fixed, I beleive this
issue to be resolved as well.
Closing old bugs that haven't had any activity in a couple months. If this problem has not been verified or you still have problems, please open a new bug.
